message: post from my verizon droid.  looks like it works to me.
@godber The back button is one we really want to tackle... I'm getting @joshboles's old droid tomorrow, believe it or not I've done all my testing in the browser so far

@godber Ah, yeah, that's on my radar too, I think it will be pretty easy to put something in for that.  It is all HTML/JS/CSS+phonegap.  I've got it running on my iPhone (same version) but the distribution things on iPhone are pain enough for us to focus on android first.
Apologies for obvious issue reports here: 1) No feedback on actions, 2) "Back" button doesn't go to previous view

I may be vague here, not "no feedback" in the sense that nothing happens, but no spinner or other distraction while the thing I started takes time to finish.  For instance at login or when loading a group.  I click, it pauses, I wonder if I clicked, and then it loads.
What sort of actions aren't giving some sort of feedback?
nice job so far.  So its HTML/js?
Who is on Android 2.1?  If anybody is, could you let me know?
yep. it does
post from nexus one. does it work?
woot!
@badboy Thanks for trying it out, let me know what you think
Not working on Droid Pro (running Android 2.2). Login screen not letting me enter text in password field.
@Gary_Owhere Thanks for the heads up, I'll investigate
@issackelly I was able to login to Conk on Droid Pro.
@Gary_Owhere I think that maybe you were seeing an issue with the form display?  I've seen that one before, looks like both are password input.
Yep, the login form display was confusing me a bit with username and password input fields.  Got it sorted out now, thanks!
In the pycon Scotch BoF no matter how many times I load it, scroll it, still says 2 new items there.
Yeah, new scrolling algorithm too :) As soon as I build I'll let you know
WIthin conversations? That should be automatic

Got it working on cyanogen 7 so 2.3. The back button is a big thing, also lack of refresh buttons within conversations. Outer refresh button doesn't seem to work. Or maybe it's just that reading isn't marking items as read, not sure which.
cool, thanks, I'll check it out
Other than that, there's some ui overlap in the back "Conk" in the heading with the search page, scrolling seems a bit difficult. It scrolls, but small bits at a time and isn't very smooth..
@issackelly awesome, glad to hear of updates/build coming
@mitechie: we have the back button working, and the inputs on login are fixed.  We're dangerously close to a market build
@issackelly hah, ok. I'll try to be patient for the update and stop reporting stuff you know :)

If it helps, I think it's something about refreshing the levels deep. In the conversation I seem caught up, but once I hit the back and go to the list of conversations, that doesn't seem up to date. For instance, this thread has new items, and in the list of conversations ni this group it shows "Just" as update time. But if I go up to the list of groups it's showing "3hrs" as the last update
Yeah, that does help.  I see something now that might be causing that
and thanks for getting it out/up. Sure it'll be really helpful on site.
working great. posting this from a droid incredible
